Hi! I'm Arnav👨‍💻

I'm a student pursuing a B.S. in Computer Science at Cornell University, expected to graduate in May 2025. I'm currently working on a product that allows developer to implement custom evaluation metrics and RLHF for their LLM applications via an API. You can learn more about Kiwi 🥝here.

You can find projects that I've worked on in theplaygroundsection. If you're interested in speaking with me, you can book a time or contact me via the contact section.

Alternatively, you could try this ✍️ (experimental!)chatbot.

Playground🪜

This section contains most of the projects - mostly code and links to my GitHub - that I've worked on. A lot of these projects were collaborations with other really smart people.

Topics include: Algorithmic Game Theory, Theorem Proving, Recommendation Systems, Knowledge Retrieval Systems, Computer Vision, Pacman, and Kaggle Competitions.

📸 Thumbnail credits: Google Images, ChatGPT

ProveML

A natural-language theorem prover for proposition logic

Pollution and the Price of Anarchy

How bad can selfish-routing get vs the social optimum?

Data Sun

Creating a recommendation system for Cornell&apos;s newspaper

HoopTracker

Detailed statistics on pickup basketball games

Beyond Vector Search: Axiomatic RAG

Using traditional AI for retrieval

BrandSync

Create, and post graphics and text for Social Media

Contact ☎️

You can reach me through email ✉️, connect with me on LinkedIn 🦅, or book a time to meet virtually on my calendar 📅

Alternatively, you can chat with the AI below to learn more about me - my interests, skills, availability, and more! Feedback on this would be greatly appreciated! 🙏
